LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a]) +- Sort(orderBy=[c ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testSortWithoutTimeWithLimit
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable ORDER BY c LIMIT 2
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], fetch=[2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[c ASC], select=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testSortWithoutTimeWithLimit0
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable ORDER BY c LIMIT 0
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a]) +- Sort(orderBy=[c ASC], fetch=[0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testSortWithoutTimeWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable ORDER BY c OFFSET 2
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalSort(sort0=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], offset=[2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a]) +- Sort(orderBy=[c ASC], offset=[2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- DataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, proctime, rowtime])
